name: Toy Tanks (itch) (Ruben-Armas)
description:
ToyTanks is a reimagined, procedural version of Wii Tanks, in which you can play alone or in co-op.

The objective is to hold as many rounds as possible to climb up the leaderboard.

But it won't be easy, you will have to face different enemies whose only goal is to destroy you.

Features

  • Genre: Shooter
  • View: Isometric
  • Players: Single player / Local Multiplayer
  • Controll: Keyboard & mouse / Gamepad
  • Platforms: Windows
  • Language: English

Credits

  • Design and development: Rubén Armas

Assets

  • Assets UI-Pack → kenney & kenney_Space-Expansion 
  • Tanks-Pack → AssetStore  

Audio Effects

  • Effects → kenney_impact-sounds
  • Big Explosion → pixabay   

Music

  • Menu → pixabay_/last-fight
  • Game → pixabaywar_of-the-crown (Copyrighted)
